references.paper_title: Scale-space flow for end-to-end optimized video compression
references.reason: This paper is a foundational work in learning-based video compression, proposing an end-to-end approach that outperforms traditional methods.

references.paper_title: Variational image compression with a scale hyperprior
references.reason: This paper introduced a novel approach to image compression that significantly improved the rate-distortion performance, using a variational autoencoder with a hyperprior.

This paper introduced a novel neural representation method for videos that combines the advantages of implicit neural representations with video compression techniques, enabling high compression ratios and fast decoding.

references.paper_title: DVC: an end-to-end deep video compression framework
references.reason: This paper is a seminal work in deep learning-based video compression, introducing an end-to-end framework that achieved state-of-the-art results at the time.

references.paper_title: Joint autoregressive and hierarchical priors for learned image compression
references.reason: This paper proposed a novel approach that combines autoregressive and hierarchical priors for image compression, leading to significant improvements in compression efficiency.
